img.p: Please Note: Clicking 'Log In' or 'Sign Up' will send you to UPS.com login page. After login you'll be returned to TForceFreight.com

div.p: Go Paperless with Electronic Delivery Receipts!
You will no longer receive paper Delivery Receipts at your MyLTL location, shown below:
Your Electronic Delivery Receipts will be available for viewing in MyLTL Documents.
Go Paperless anytime by visiting the Customize option.

td.h5: TForce Freight Easy Pay Release Date 1/30

div.p: Starting Thursday 1/26, payments for TForce Freight invoices will no longer be accepted in The UPS Billing Center. On Monday 1/30 you'll be able to access TForce Freight Easy Pay to make payments on your invoices.
Please note that you will receive information about enrolling in TForce Freight Easy Pay from our partner Bill Trust, and our TForce Freight Accounts Receivable (AR) team.

div.h2: Get Started with TForce Freight LTL

div.p: Obtain a rate estimate to begin processing your shipment.
Determine transit times and the estimated date of delivery for your shipment.
Request a TForce Freight pickup for your shipment(s).

Additional information including fuel surcharges, holiday schedules and information for processing your
TForce Freight shipment.
Can't find what you are looking for? Have additional questions? Contact Us

tr.td: These cookies are required for basic site functionality and are therefore always enabled. These include cookies that allow you to be remembered as you explore the site within a single session or, if you request, from session to session. They help make the shopping cart and checkout process possible as well as assist in security issues and conforming to regulations.
Analytics solutions are used to identify visitor interaction with this website for the purpose of improving the site experience or fixing potential issues with the site.
